mapper.select: SELECT BOOK.BOOK_CODE , BOOK_TITLE FROM BOOK_BORROW BORROW , BOOK BOOK WHERE BORROW.BOOK_CODE = BOOK.BOOK_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND BORROW_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3) GROUP BY BOOK.BOOK_CODE , BOOK_TITLE ORDER BY MAX(BORROW_DATE) DESC
